advancement.valoria:aloe: Jedno Aloe dziennie trzyma medyka z daleka
advancement.valoria:first_help.desc: U≈ºyj banda≈ºa z aloesu, aby zregenerowaƒá zdrowie

advancement.valoria:harmony_heart.desc: ZdobƒÖd≈∫ Serce Harmonii za zabicie DƒÖbrowce
codex.valoria.aquarius_core:
Imbuing the core with the power of #7ebfff the bottomless sea /& opens the path to elemental infusion. 
 To acquire the needed materials, one must defeat Deep Elementals (-).
codex.valoria.aquarius_core.name: Aquarius Core
codex.valoria.black_gold:
A dark alloy, forged from cobalt and gold under anomalous conditions. 
 This metal pulses with residual elemental energy and serves as a key to infusion ‚Äî a process that imbues weapons and artifacts with primordial power.
codex.valoria.black_gold.name: Black Gold
codex.valoria.bosses: This modification introduces a variety of unique bosses into the world. Follow this branch to learn more about each one ‚Äî their lore and the ways to summon them.
codex.valoria.bosses.name: Bosses
codex.valoria.bosses_continuation: To kill the Necromancer firstly obtain a Necromancer Grimoire from killing Draugrs or Sorcerers.
codex.valoria.crypt: Rzadkie struktury pojawiajƒÖce siƒô w ≈õwiecie, pe≈Çne niebezpiecze≈Ñstw, wiƒôc uwa≈ºaj przed wej≈õciem i eksploracjƒÖ.
codex.valoria.crypt.name: Krypta
codex.valoria.crypt_continuation: Many of them descended underground, leaving behind buried temples steeped in death
codex.valoria.dryador: The Fallen King of the Ents was once the majestic ruler of the living forests of Arethea, and later, the shadowed groves of Valoria. Under his watch, the trees spoke and nature itself seemed alive.
codex.valoria.dryador.continuation: only echoes remain: withered roots, silent glades, and forests swallowed by darkness. The king himself has fallen, yet his spirit knows no rest ‚Äî ancient sorrow and an unfulfilled oath bind his soul.
codex.valoria.dryador.name: The King of Nature
codex.valoria.fortress:
Dark halls that once stood as the bastion of an ancient civilization. 
 Its walls once held the light ‚Äî now they whisper only of oblivion. 
 The fortress was built as a seal ‚Äî a bulwark keeping evil beyond the edge of the world.
codex.valoria.fortress.hint: Take a visit to the Void Fortress
codex.valoria.fortress.name: Fortress
codex.valoria.fortress_continuation:
Now it‚Äôs a tomb of secrets, broken by time and shadow, 
 where the past groans through the cracks in the stone
codex.valoria.geodes.desc: Geody to podziemne formacje, generowane w geodytach. Te intrygujƒÖce struktury kryjƒÖ w sobie potencja≈Ç dla rzadkich zasob√≥w. Aby odblokowaƒá ich skarby, rozbij geody przy u≈ºyciu kruszarki kamienia.
codex.valoria.harmony_crown: Winding roots, woven into a crown, radiate ancient power ‚Äî as if the Mother Nature itself had poured a fragment of its will into them. Once, this crown adorned the brow of the last king of the Ents, who ruled the forests of Arethea.
codex.valoria.harmony_crown.continuation: Legends say that wearing it in places where the world still remembers its primal power may awaken the ancient guardian of the forest ‚Äî Dryador himself, a spirit once bound between roots and time
codex.valoria.harmony_crown.name: Crown of Harmony
codex.valoria.heavy_workbench: A workshop for invention. Using blueprints, artifacts, fragments, or rare materials, one can craft powerful items ‚Äî stronger than most, but far harder to obtain.
codex.valoria.heavy_workbench.name: Tinkerer Workbench
codex.valoria.infernal_core:
Scorching the core with #fba000 the fires /& of the underworld initiates elemental infusion. 
 To gather the components, you'll need to slay Fire Elementals (Devils).
codex.valoria.infernal_core.name: Infernal Core
codex.valoria.king_crab:
Elemental of the Depths, when its health drops below 30 percents has a chance to hide into its shell. 
 
 Attacking it while its hidden will shorten defensive state, while its hidden in the sell it will restore its health
codex.valoria.king_crab.name: King Crab
codex.valoria.knowledge: Nawet je≈õli stracisz tƒô ksiƒÖ≈ºkƒô... Zawsze mo≈ºesz jƒÖ ponownie stworzyƒá, aby uzyskaƒá dostƒôp do wiedzy!
codex.valoria.knowledge.name: Klucz do wiedzy
codex.valoria.main: Witamy w Leksykonie, tutaj mo≈ºesz przeczytaƒá informacje o modyfikacji, kt√≥re mogƒÖ byƒá przydatne dla poczƒÖtkujƒÖcych
codex.valoria.main.name: G≈Ç√≥wne
codex.valoria.medicine: Stw√≥rz banda≈ºe u≈ºywajƒÖc kawa≈Çk√≥w aloesu i sznurka. ZapewniajƒÖ one przed≈Çu≈ºonƒÖ regeneracjƒô, choƒá sƒÖ mniej skuteczne ni≈º zwyk≈Çe. Ulepsz je na kolejnej stronie, aby zwiƒôkszyƒá efekty i nieco wyd≈Çu≈ºyƒá czas dzia≈Çania!
codex.valoria.medicine.name: Medycyna
codex.valoria.nature_core:
The fusion of a core with the force of #96fd6e nature /& and harmony enables elemental infusion. 
 To obtain the necessary materials, one must hunt Forest Elementals (Ents).
codex.valoria.nature_core.name: Nature Core
codex.valoria.necromancer:
A sorcerer who betrayed the natural balance of life and death. 
 After the Elemental Collapse, as the boundaries between realms thinned, they found in the Void an unending source of necrotic energy
codex.valoria.necromancer.name: The Necromancer
codex.valoria.necromancer_continuation: calling the dead from beneath the earth and granting them life in return for eternal servitude
codex.valoria.necromancer_grimoire:
Not every book is meant to be read. 
 This ash-covered, bloodstained tome is more than an artifact ‚Äî it‚Äôs a vessel for the will of one who once ruled over death itself.
codex.valoria.necromancer_grimoire.name: Necromancer Grimoire
codex.valoria.necromancer_grimoire_conti: To awaken the Necromancer, one must find his buried crypt and place the grimoire upon the ancient altar Only then will the secrets of forbidden magic rise‚Ä¶ along with its master
codex.valoria.pages:
Find new pages in dungeons, craft items to unlock their info, or get them from defeating bosses. 
 
 Pages marked #ccc087 Random Obtainable /& can drop from dungeon loot as random pages
codex.valoria.pages.name: Pages
codex.valoria.pick:
Prospectors Pickaxe allows you to excavate ancient artifacts from suspicious-looking stones. 
 Special accessories can accelerate the excavation process.
codex.valoria.pick.name: Prospectors Pick
codex.valoria.stone_crusher.description: To use the Stone Crusher firstly place a gem, or a geode, then click [RMB] while holding Pickaxe in hand
codex.valoria.suspicious_gem:
A mysterious shard glowing with an alien light. 
 Said to be a fragment of an entity whose name has been erased. 
 Used in an ancient awakening ritual deep within the fortress.
codex.valoria.suspicious_gem.name: Suspicious Gem
codex.valoria.suspicious_gem_continuatio: Only those brave enough to offer it to the altar will see what lurks beyond the veil of darkness
codex.valoria.tinkerer_workbench: A workshop for invention. Using blueprints, artifacts, fragments, or rare materials, one can craft powerful items ‚Äî stronger than most, but far harder to obtain.
codex.valoria.tinkerer_workbench.name: Tinkerer Workbench
codex.valoria.treasure.gems: Klejnoty, kt√≥re mogƒÖ wypa≈õƒá z toreb. A nawet wydobyte w jaskiniach, te klejnoty sƒÖ rzadkie, ale bi≈ºuteria z nimi zapewnia graczowi bonusy!
codex.valoria.treasure.gems.about: Bursztyn zwiƒôksza Przyspieszenie, ametyst wzmacnia obra≈ºenia magiczne, rubin zwiƒôksza maksymalne HP, szafir zwiƒôksza prƒôdko≈õƒá p≈Çywania, szmaragd dodaje szczƒô≈õcia, a diament wzmacnia pancerz.
codex.valoria.treasure.gems.name: Klejnoty
codex.valoria.treasures: W lochach mo≈ºna znale≈∫ƒá torby skarb√≥w, w kt√≥rych mo≈ºna znale≈∫ƒá rzadkie przedmioty, takie jak klejnoty, kt√≥re mo≈ºna wykorzystaƒá do tworzenia bi≈ºuterii!
codex.valoria.treasures.name: Skarby
codex.valoria.undead:
Undead ‚Äî constructs of bone and magic. Artificial, unstable, they exist only as long as the fading spell sustains them. 
 When the magic wanes, they crumble into dust.
codex.valoria.undead.name: Undead
codex.valoria.valoria_portal:
A portal to the forgotten lands, named Valoria. 
 
 World that was eaten by the #7061b7 void /& itself...
codex.valoria.valoria_portal.name: Valoria Portal
codex.valoria.void_core:
Warping the core with the essence of #7061b7 the Void /& leads to infusion based on the power of nothingness. 
 To gain the materials, one must eliminate Void Elementals (-).
codex.valoria.void_core.name: Void core
codex.valoria.wicked_crystal:
Once the heart of the fortress ‚Äî a source of power that shielded the ancient halls from invaders. 
 
 But when the world fell into shadow, its walls became a tomb, and its guardian ‚Äî a twisted shade.
codex.valoria.wicked_crystal.name: Wicked Crystal
codex.valoria.wicked_crystal_continuatio:
The crystal, once gleaming with hope, became a seed of ruin, poisoning all it touched. 
 
 Legends say it once carried the will of a vanished civilization... 
 Now, it only whispers of devastation
